overview: The tawdry story continues as women seduce other women, make love to them and leave them for others. In a lesbian love triangle, no hearts are safe from the crushing blow of a sexually-liberated woman empowered. With Anita Dark, Juliana Jolene, India Summer and more, Girlfriend Films takes lesbian adult entertainment to a whole new level of intensity, realism, and passion.
title: Lesbian Triangles 15
